channel.title: [PI] Easy kinda help [REP++]
channel.description:
A little problem, i got 'Raw' files in my PI & I wanna know where do I locate the location of Raw files = Models containing files. Any class or whateva that locates the location of the folder. Please help me. I really need help.
Will sure REP++ if you helped me.
Sagi

item.title: [PI] Easy kinda help [REP++]
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Not sure what you mean…
But the custom item should be located in Item_Def, or Item_def2.

Read full topic
